ne18:2.1_0: Yo dhammo yaṁ dhammaṁ janayati, tassa so parikkhāro.
ne18:2.4_0: Dve dhammā janayanti hetu ca paccayo ca.
ne18:2.8_0: Yathā aṅkurassa nibbattiyā bījaṁ asādhāraṇaṁ, pathavī āpo ca sādhāraṇā.
ne18:2.9_0: Aṅkurassa hi pathavī āpo ca paccayo sabhāvo hetu.
ne18:2.10_0: Yathā vā pana ghaṭe duddhaṁ pakkhittaṁ dadhi bhavati,
ne18:2.10_1: na catthi ekakālasamavadhānaṁ duddhassa ca dadhissa ca.
ne18:2.11_0: Evamevaṁ natthi ekakālasamavadhānaṁ hetussa ca paccayassa ca.
ne18:3.2_0: Vuttaṁ hi avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṁ, evaṁ sabbo paṭiccasamuppādo.
ne18:3.3_0: Iti avijjā avijjāya hetu ayoniso manasikāro paccayo.
ne18:3.5_0: Tattha purimikā avijjā avijjānusayo pacchimikā avijjā avijjāpariyuṭṭhānaṁ,
ne18:3.5_1: purimiko avijjānusayo pacchimikassa avijjāpariyuṭṭhānassa hetubhūto paribrūhanāya,
ne18:3.7_0: Duvidho hi hetu samanantarahetu paramparahetu ca,
ne18:3.7_1: evaṁ avijjāyapi duvidho hetu samanantarahetu paramparahetu ca.
ne18:4.1_0: Yathā vā pana thālakañca vaṭṭi ca telañca padīpassa paccayabhūtaṁ na sabhāvahetu,
ne18:4.1_1: na hi sakkā thālakañca vaṭṭiñca telañca anaggikaṁ dīpetuṁ padīpassa paccayabhūtaṁ.
ne18:5.1_0: Avupacchedattho santati attho, nibbatti attho phalattho,
ne18:5.3_3: yattha avijjā tattha sāsavaṁ viññāṇaṁ apariññātaṁ,
ne18:5.3_4: yattha sāsavaṁ viññāṇaṁ apariññātaṁ tattha bījattho.
ne18:7.1_0: Yathā vā pana cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ.
ne18:7.3_0: Āloko sannissayatāya paccayo, manasikāro sabhāvo hetu.
ne18:7.19_0: Evaṁ yo koci upanissayo sabbo so parikkhāro.
ne18:7.20_0: Tenāha āyasmā mahākaccāyano “ye dhammā yaṁ dhammaṁ janayantī”ti.
